To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MorningDojiStar _morningdojistar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_morningdojistar = MorningDojiStar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_morningdojistar.IsReady)
{
    var period = _morningdojistar.Period.Value;
    var current = _morningdojistar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.morningdojistar = self.MorningDojiStar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.morningdojistar.IsReady:
    period = self.morningdojistar.Period.Value
    current = self.morningdojistar.Current.Value
